thread.title: Markets on launch pad after 'Rocket Man' boost

title: Markets on launch pad after 'Rocket Man' boost
text:
Markets on launch pad after 'Rocket Man' boost Tuesday, January 02, 2018 - 01:29 
European markets start the first trading day of the year on a nervous footing despite record manufacturing surveys for the euro zone. But as Ivor Bennett reports, Asian shares scaled a decade peak after a surprisingly upbeat survey of Chinese manufacturing and signs of a thaw in Korean relations.
